Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation

Annotation Interface FrameworkAdapter

@Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Inherited public @interface FrameworkAdapter
Annotation for defining a framework adapter that configures base packages for test execution.

This annotation is used to specify the base packages that should be included when setting up a test context. It is typically applied to custom meta-annotations that define test execution behavior by integrating different testing extensions.

The framework automatically detects and processes classes annotated with @FrameworkAdapter using reflection, ensuring that the appropriate test setup is applied.

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String[]
    basePackages
    Specifies the base packages to be included in the test context.

  • Element Details

    • basePackages

      String[] basePackages
      Specifies the base packages to be included in the test context.

      These packages define the scope of the test adapter and ensure that the necessary components are scanned and configured for execution.

      Returns:
      An array of base package names for the test adapter.
